_header: First is pride and sithen envy
_description: The Seven Deadly Sins — three couplets

BodHat12.First Lines:
First es pryde & sythen envyeAnd þan es wrethe &
                    glotony…
BodHat12.Last Lines:
…þir er þe seuen dedely synsþat mas soule fro
                    blisse wyns
BodHat12.Editions:
Bloomfield,  Morton. 
             The Seven Deadly Sins….
         East Lansing, MI: Michigan State College Press, 1952: 169.
